Reviews.Title: “Fine **hotel, just fine!”
Reviews.Author: Vanya2012
Reviews.Content: week 2nd week april 2012 weve spend days hotel reading reviews page bit worried lot doubts stay arrival nice english wasnt friendly helpfull signing book explained weve reading reviews leaving roomkey leaving hotel receptiondesk closed 1 6 means hotel 1 stay untill 6 breakfast 5 euro person day 10 euro advance assigned third floor stairs elevator bit shabby actually im easilly scared person arriving happily surprised pretty looked clean double bed closet own bathroom toilet shower etc overlooked streetside therefor noisy youre looking cheap hotel close trainstation 50m shops restaurant 20min walk rome rome busy tourists expansive hotel noisy stars cheap price lovely stay reply ive reading didnt leave etc robbery yes station pretty dodgy didnt feel unsafe tourists worries beds fine clean noise bathroom fine clean fine smelly pipes unfriendly staff nice theyll nice enjoy rome dont 300 euro youll happily surprised

Reviews.Title: “good for a couple of nights, if you need to use public transport”
Reviews.Author: Marin81
Reviews.Content: hotel ok staying 1 nights 2 close train station plenty bars shops cleanliness acceptable bathroom bit smelly due pipes beds unconfortable noisy price payed 40 eur night ok

Reviews.Title: “Vanishing Money”
Reviews.Author: Raychel S
Reviews.Content: hotel policy keys handed reception cleaner clean left money suit safety day trip gone reception key day manager dismissed told sort happen hotel explained help told happened told manager call police declared police hotel police station manager followed shouting abuse left feeling

Reviews.Title: “WHAT YOU SEE IS WHAT YOU GET! EXCELLENT FOR CITY HOPPERS AND STUDENTS”
Reviews.Author: Faustocoppi1953
Reviews.Content: doubts booking seeing termini slept 30 times hotel cheapest clean clean bathroom friendly receptionist hey pay 10 euro store luggage day advance breakfast didnt try hotel wich offers propper breakfast cheap rates paid 25 euro person yes rembrandt hanging wall thermal bath visit rome slept clean bed enjoyed cafés neighboorhood talks owner happy satisfied

Reviews.Title: “IT'S BASIC, BUT A GREAT BASE TO SEE THE SIGHTS”
Reviews.Author: INCE1971
Reviews.Content: booked hotel cheapest ensuite clean functional noisy night overlooked road knackered sightseeing didnt matter staff helpful polite air con 10 euros night didnt bother didnt facilities booked hotel train station usual dodgy characters meant entertainment free watching window didnt feel danger walking tourists easy using metro buses luxury wont base explore beautiful city rome comfortable weekend including flights accommodation 4 days £300 2 tin pay

Reviews.Title: “Danger Will Robinson!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: JaynePfingst
Reviews.Content: arrived usual jovial australian enthusiasm despite scum walk past reception announced checking 4 nights english reply folded arms stared blankly beginning nightmare dont phone charged friend excess 100euros calls didnt connect wouldnt key phone paid allowed key leave site personal belongings accessible staff absolutely positive oh lie werent raped killed believe bad reviews

Reviews.Title: “Oh dear......”
Reviews.Author: grenners
Reviews.Content: bed night fine hand bed night expose yourself policeman bed night police station breakfast probably cheaper recommend hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Marechiaro
HotelInfo.Address: Via Gioberti 30, Rome, Italy
